title: Agriturismo La Rianda
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Farm restaurant providing traditional Italian cuisine as well a separate vegetarian menu. Offers wine produced by its farm, and vegetarian food made with farm fresh organic vegetable. The restaurant is surrounded by the green Piedmont hills where guest can take walks. The farm is located Panaro, Via San Rocco Monastery Bormida, in the heart of the Langa of Asti, hilly landscape of the Lower Piedmont, rich in forests and vineyards.
